```{r load data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(GAMUT)
require(dplyr)
require(knitr)

```

```{r table of IDs and program names, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results="asis"}
program_name_ID <-
    ID.lookup %>%
    inner_join(program_info) %>%
    select(program_name, ID, city, state, dm_email)


kable(program_name_ID, col.names = c("Program Name", "ID", "City", "State", "Email"))


```
